arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief reacts to narrow defeat at Huddersfield Town - 'If you don't do that, you probably don't deserve to take anything...'
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney admitted he was left with a 'feeling of frustration' after Wigan Athletic lost for the first time in five games by the odd goal at Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Huddersfield Town 1 Wigan Athletic 0 - Below-par Tics see resurgence checked by Terriers
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic lost for the first time in five matches as League One play-off chasers Huddersfield Town edged a scrappy game in West Yorkshire by the only goal.

arts.ttl: Ollie Turton’s strike enough for Huddersfield to see off Wigan
arts.sum: It was Turton’s his first goal for a club he joined in 2021.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Three changes in our expected team v Huddersfield Town
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at League One play-off chasing Huddersfield Town.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers increase ex-Wigan Athletic contingent on backroom staff
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic forward Brett Ormerod has joined the growing ex-Tics contingent on the backroom staff at neighbours Bolton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Premier League side reveal former Wigan Athletic star did not wear rainbow armband due to religious beliefs
arts.sum: Former Wigan Athletic captain Sam Morsy chose not to wear a rainbow armband in support of the LGBTQ+ community at the weekend due to his religious beliefs, his current side Ipswich Town have revealed.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic handed League One trip in round three of the FA Cup
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic have been drawn away from home for the third time in a row after being paired with fellow League One outfit Mansfield Town in round three of the FA Cup.

arts.ttl: FA Cup third round draw LIVE: Updates as Liverpool, Manchester United and Premier League sides learn fate
arts.sum: A total of 64 sides will found out their opponents for the next round, with all Championship and Premier League sides entering the draw

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief hails 'unsung hero' - 'Physically, the guy is a machine...'
arts.sum: Thelo Aasgaard's importance to Wigan Athletic this season has gone largely under the radar because of the heroics of Sam Tickle.

arts.ttl: Josh Windass opens up on 'wrong mentality' that hampered his Wigan Athletic stay
arts.sum: Josh Windass has spoken of the 'wrong mentality' he brought to Wigan Athletic after signing from Scottish giants Rangers in the summer of 2018.
